髐髐髐

髐字的基本解释

髐
xiāo
〔髐然〕骨骼枯空而破损的样子，如“庄子之楚，见空髑髅，髐髐有形。”
古同“髇”。

髐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《集韻》虚交切，平爻，曉。］
同“髇1”。
(1)同“髇”。
(2)空枯貌。
(3)通“骹”。小腿。

髐字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【骨字部】　髐； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1450第51
【集韻】虛交切，音哮。【玉篇】髐，箭也。　又【莊子·至樂篇】莊子之楚，見空髑髏，髐然有形。【釋文】髐，白骨貌。　又【集韻】馨幺切，音撓。義同。

髐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
髐字的起名意思

暂无。

Ya
Basic explanation of words
Ya
xiāo
〔髐然〕The skeleton is empty and broken, like "Zhuangzi's Chu, see the empty skull, the skull is visible."
The ancient same "髇".
Ya
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Jiyun" imaginary intersection, flat line, dawn. ]
Same as "髇1".
(1) Same as "髇".
(2) Empty and dry appearance.
(3) Through "Mun". Calf.
Ya
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Bone Character Department】　髐; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1450 51
[Jiyun] Virtual intersecting, sound roaring. [Jade articles] 髐, arrows also.　[Zhuangzi·Zhi Le Chapter] Zhuangzi’s Chu, see the empty skull, it is tangible. 【Explanation】Nia, white bone appearance.　[Jiyun] Xinyao cut, sound scratched. The same meaning.
Ya
